LanguageData.Apparello_Lederhose.label: Leather Pants
LanguageData.Apparello_Lederhose.description: These are a pair of leather pants (sometimes even real leather!). The punk wearing these will always feel lucky.
LanguageData.Norballo_Loincloth.label: Loincloth
LanguageData.Norballo_Loincloth.description: A tribal loincloth. It covers parts of you, sort of.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Pants_Suspenders.label: Suspended Trousers
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Pants_Suspenders.descripti: Medieval era pants, they fit awkwardly and are stitched together with clearly visible leather laces. You need a pair of suspenders to keep these up.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Pants_Suspenders_Striped.d: Medieval era pants, they fit awkwardly and are stitched together with clearly visible leather laces. You need a pair of suspenders to keep these up. At least they have strips to show the owners originality.
LanguageData.Apparello_Jeans.label: Jeans
LanguageData.Apparello_Suspender.label: Stablehand Trousers
LanguageData.Apparello_Suspender.description: Ain't a chap on earf lookin' as honest as one wearin' these. With these equipped one should feel more comfortable wading through mud and filth and therefore more inclined to get the job done without distractions.
LanguageData.Apparel_Pants.label: Suspender Pants
LanguageData.Apparel_Pants.description: A simple set of pants with suspenders that drape over the shoulders to hold the pants up.
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakPants.label: flak pants
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakPants.description: A pair of pants with armor plates sewn in. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable.
LanguageData.Apparello_Holdem.label: Fancy Pants
LanguageData.Apparello_Holdem.description: Fancy Pants are for elegant colonists. Your legs will be the star of the show!
LanguageData.Apparello_Holser.label: Holstered Chaps
LanguageData.Apparello_Holser.description: A pair of chaps with holsters. All of the fastest shooters wore these. They usually got shot in the back.
